values: The Doctrine of Perseverance: The Future of a Fruitless FieldThe Doctrine of Perseverance: The Future of a Fruitless Field

One of the ways God causes us to persevere in faith and be saved is
      by warning us that we could make shipwreck of our faith and be
      lost.

    by warning us that we could make shipwreck of our faith and be
    lost.
